backend

Class DialogGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.DialogGenerator

  • public class DialogGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has all the necessary public static dialog methods, which are needed in the game.
    Version:
    %I%, %G%
    Author:
    Furkan Yesiler

    • Constructor Detail

      • DialogGenerator

        public DialogGenerator()

    • Method Detail

      • sellDialog

        public static void sellDialog(Player player,
                              Game game)
        This dialogs pops up when a player presses "Sell" button on their player panel. It asks the player if she wants to sell or mortgage a property and takes action.
        Parameters:
        player - who called this dialog
        game - in which the arriving player exists
        Modifies:
        the property list and the mortgaged property list of the player

      • buildDialog

        public static void buildDialog(Player player,
                               Game game)
        This dialogs pops up when a player presses "Build" button on their player panel. It asks the player if she wants to build a property(house, hotel etc.) and takes action.
        Parameters:
        player - who called this dialog
        game - in which the arriving player exists
        Modifies:
        number of houses, hotels, skyscrapers, cab stands, depots on properties

      • HouseCondemnedDialog

        public static java.lang.String HouseCondemnedDialog(java.util.ArrayList<deedSquare> deedsList)
        This dialog box pops up when a player is applying House Condemned card. It asks the player to choose a deed on which the card should take action.
        Parameters:
        deedlist - deeds of the player that has houses on them
        Returns:
        name of the property player wants to take action on
        Requires:
        player should have houses on her deeds

      • hurricaneDialog

        public static void hurricaneDialog(Player player,
                                   Game game)
        This dialogs pops up when a player draws Hurricane card. It asks player to choose a color group and then passes it to another method.
        Parameters:
        player - who called this dialog
        game - in which the arriving player exists
        Modifies:
        number of houses, hotels, skyscrapers on properties

      • GoAnySquareDialog

        public static void GoAnySquareDialog(Player player,
                                     Game game)
        This dialog asks the player on which square she wants to go and passes the result.
        Parameters:
        player - who called this dialog
        game - in which the arriving player exists
        Modifies:
        location of the player

      • ErrorDialog

        public static void ErrorDialog()
        This dialogs pops up when something inappropriate happens.
        Requires:
        an error state

      • MoneyNeededDialog

        public static void MoneyNeededDialog(Player player,
                                     Game game)
        This dialogs pops up when a player needs money to continue playing the game.
        Parameters:
        player - who called this dialog
        game - in which the arriving player exists
        Modifies:
        the property list and the mortgaged property list of the player

      • AskYesNoDialog

        public static boolean AskYesNoDialog(java.lang.String title,
                                     java.lang.String message)
        This dialog is a generic one and it uses the parameters to create a yes/no dialog.
        Parameters:
        title - title of the message box
        message - message of the dialog
        Returns:
        player's decision

      • AssetsSeizedDialog

        public static buyableSquare AssetsSeizedDialog(java.util.ArrayList<buyableSquare> propList,
                                               Game game)
        This dialog pops up when a player draws Assets Seized card from the deck.
        Parameters:
        propList - property list of the player who drew the card
        game - in which the arriving player exists
        Returns:
        the property player chose from her property list
        Requires:
        property list of the player should not be null

      • ForeclosedPropertySaleDialog

        public static buyableSquare ForeclosedPropertySaleDialog(java.util.ArrayList<buyableSquare> propList,
                                                         Game game)
        This dialogs pops up when a player draws Foreclosed Property Sale card from the deck.
        Parameters:
        propList - current mortgaged property list
        game - in which the arriving player exists
        Returns:
        the property player chose

      • TaxiWarsDialog

        public static cabSquare TaxiWarsDialog(java.util.ArrayList<cabSquare> cabList,
                                       Game game)
        This dialogs pops up when a player draws Taxi Wars card from the deck.
        Parameters:
        cabList - list of cab squares on the board
        game - in which the arriving player exists
        Returns:
        the cab square player chose

      • ZeroDollarsDownDialog

        public static deedSquare ZeroDollarsDownDialog(java.util.ArrayList<deedSquare> deedList,
                                               Game game)
        This dialogs pops up when a player draws Zero Dollars Down card from the deck.
        Parameters:
        deedList - deed list of the player
        game - in which the arriving player exists
        Returns:
        the property player chose

      • CabSquareDialog

        public static java.lang.String CabSquareDialog()
        This dialogs pops up when a player lands on a Cab Square. It asks player where to go.
        Returns:
        the square player wants to go

      • UseCardDialog

        public static void UseCardDialog(Player player,
                                 Game game)
        This dialogs pops up when a player clicks on Use Card button on the player panel.
        Parameters:
        player - who called this dialog
        game - in which the arriving player exists
        Modifies:
        card list of the player and other fields depending on the card

        public static java.lang.String getStringFromUser(java.lang.String msg)
